detail_desc: Outdoor shorts in slightly stretchy, water-repellent, functional fabric with side pockets and a zipped leg pocket. Zip fly and press-studs and inset stretch jersey at the crotch for optimum movement and comfort. The shorts have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Knee-length dress in ribbed jersey with a polo neck and long sleeves.

Padded parka in sturdy fabric with a stand-up collar and detachable, faux shearling-lined hood with a faux fur trim. Concealed zip down the front with a wind flap and visible buttons. Handwarmer pockets with a press-stud, patch front pockets with a flap and button, a zipped sleeve pocket and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.
Ankle boots with a zip in the side, satin linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Covered heel approx. 6 cm.
Whooli Chen x H&M. Long-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey with a round neckline and ribbing at the cuffs. Some of the cotton content of the top is recycled.

Set with a top and pair of trousers in soft velour made from a cotton blend. Long-sleeved top with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y) and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Trousers with an easy pull-on, elasticated, drawstring waist and ribbed hems. The cotton content of the set is organic.

Fully lined, super push-up balconette bikini top with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Detachable, adjustable shoulder straps and a metal fastener at the back.
Jeans in washed stretch denim with fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs. Wide ribbing at the waist for optimum comfort.
Cropped top in soft jersey with lace details, a V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Long-sleeved dress in a fine-knit cotton and wool blend with a hole pattern at the top, a gathered seam at the waist and a flared skirt with a lace trim at the hem.
Short, gently fitted dungaree dress in woven fabric with buttons down the front, wide, adjustable shoulder straps and a seam at the waist.
Knee-length skirt with decorative buttons down the front and a concealed zip at the back.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit merino wool with a round neck, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Straight T-shirt in sturdy cotton jersey.
Bikini briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and medium coverage at the back.
Hat knitted in soft cashmere with a roll edge.
Short, fitted skirt in stretch jersey with an elasticated waist and zip at the front. Unlined.
A-line skirt in stretch cotton twill with fake pockets and buttons at the front. Unlined.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with hard-worn details, a zip fly and button, low crotch and tapered legs.
Straight-cut T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round neck, motif on the front and straight-cut hem.
High-waisted shorts in superstretch twill with a zip fly and button, back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Long-sleeved jumper in fine-knit cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
One-shoulder top in cotton jersey with elastication and a wide flounce at the top.
Ankle-length trousers in a softly draping weave. High waist with elastication at the back, pleats at the front, diagonal side pockets and wide, straight legs.
Blouse in a soft weave with a small collar, concealed buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Fully lined bikini top with laser-cut scalloped edges. Underwired, moulded, padded cups that lift and shape, ties at the back of the neck and an adjustable metal fastener at the back.
Vest tops in soft cotton jersey, one with a print motif.
Short shorts in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist, and side pockets.
Long-sleeved top in soft, organic cotton jersey with a decorative frill over the shoulders.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, slightly stretchy denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button and tapered legs.
Briefs in soft jersey made from a cotton and viscose blend with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and full coverage at the back.
Dress in a stretch weave with visible buttons down the front, adjustable straps and front pockets.
Long jumper in a fine knit containing some wool with a ribbed polo neck, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Straight style in a relaxed fit.
Shorts in lightweight organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist.
Blouse in a patterned viscose weave with a square neckline and covered buttons down the front. Long, wide sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and a seam and flounce at the hem. Lined.
Short, A-line skirt with a high waist and buttons down the front.
Cropped top in light sweatshirt fabric with a print motif. Dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves with ribbed cuffs and raw-edge hem.
5-pocket shorts in stretch cotton twill with appliqués, an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly and button.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey with a print motif on the front.
Fine-knit polo-neck jumper in a merino wool blend with a ribbed collar, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Tunic in an airy weave made from a Tencel™ lyocell blend with embroidery. Opening at the back with a covered button at the back of the neck, long balloon sleeves and wide cuffs with covered buttons. Gathered seam at the hem for added volume. Lined with a V-neck inner tunic in woven fabric with adjustable shoulder straps.

Long-sleeved dress in glittery-patterned tulle with a small frilled collar and a small opening with a button at the back of the neck. Elasticated cuffs with a flounce, a seam at the hips and a flared skirt. Jersey lining.

Quilted, lightly padded nylon jacket with a lined drawstring hood and a zip with a wind flap and press-studs down the front. Side pockets with a press-stud, long raglan sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and a drawstring hem. Lined.

Padded parka in woven fabric with a lined hood with a detachable faux fur trim. Zip with a wind flap and hook-and-loop fastening down the front, flap chest and front pockets with a press-stud and two additional zipped front pockets. Concealed drawstring at the waist and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.
Hairband in braided imitation suede with leaf and flower appliqués. Elastic at the back of the neck.
Fine-knit knee socks in a soft, thermal wool blend with elasticated tops.

prod_name: Baby Lock Me Up Push Triangle
detail_desc: Triangle bikini top with frilled trims and moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Ties at the back and back of the neck with round, flat pendants.
Vest top in soft cotton jersey in a relaxed fit. Slightly longer at the back.
Short suede skirt with decorative seams. Visible zip at the back. Lined.
Belt in imitation leather with a metal buckle. Decorative metal chain with a carabiner hook at one end. Width 2.8 cm.
Baby Exclusive. All-in-one suit in fine-knit organic cotton with long raglan sleeves and buttons down the front that continue down one leg. Roll edges around the neckline, cuffs and hems.
Straight-cut jacket in a striped weave with notch lapels, buttons at the front and welt front pockets with a flap. Decorative buttons at the cuffs. Lined.
Tights in a soft, fine rib knit containing glittery threads with an elasticated waist.

Shirt in woven fabric with an easy-iron finish. Turn-down collar, classic front and darts and a yoke at the back. Long sleeves, narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning, and a rounded hem. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Small shoulder bag in soft imitation leather with a narrow, metal-chain shoulder strap and room for a credit card. Lining in woven fabric made from recycled polyester. Width 10 cm. Height 8 cm.
Top in ribbed cotton jersey with a button placket, lace details on the shoulders, a chest pocket and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Gently rounded hem.
Treggings in soft, stretch fabric, one pair in denim, and one pair in twill. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Long cardigan in sweatshirt fabric with a drawstring hood, zip at the front, side pockets and raw edges.
Hat in a soft knit with a turned-up hem with an appliqué.
Short dress in a crêpe weave with a yoke and cap sleeves in lace. V-neck, an opening with a button at the back of the neck, and a narrow elasticated seam under the bust. Jersey lining.
Cigarette trousers in stretch twill with a regular, elasticated waist, fake fly, diagonal side pockets, fake welt back pockets and ankle-length legs with creases.
Fully lined bikini top with lightly padded cups, decorative straps at the front, wide shoulder straps for good support and a plastic fastener at the back.
5-pocket jeans in washed, superstretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
Suit trousers in twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Side pockets, jetted back pockets with a button and legs with creases.

Single-breasted jacket in a marled cotton weave with peak lapels, a decorative buttonhole, chest pocket, welt front pockets with a flap and one inner pocket. Elbow patches in imitation suede, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Half-lined. Slim fit that tapers at the chest and waist, which combined with slightly narrower sleeves creates a fitted silhouette.
Shortie briefs in cotton jersey with a mid waist, lined gusset, low-cut legs with lace trims, and medium coverage at the back.
Sleeveless dress in an airy cotton weave with elastication and a decorative bow at the back and shoulder straps with scalloped edges and broderie anglaise that meet at the back. Unlined.
Joggers in cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, and flap back and leg pockets with concealed press-studs. Tapered legs with seams at the knees and ribbed hems.
Turtleneck top in sturdy jersey with gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Longer top in soft sweatshirt fabric with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jumpsuit in an airy, patterned weave with short butterfly sleeves and press-studs on one shoulder. Elasticated seam with a decorative bow at the waist, side pockets and elasticated hems.
Long-sleeved top in soft slub jersey made from organic cotton.
Off-the-shoulder, straight-cut blouse in a cotton weave with an elasticated top with a small frill trim. Wide, half-length raglan sleeves with broderie anglaise, and broderie anglaise at the hem.
5-pocket, slim-fit jeans in washed stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y) and a zip fly and button. Straight cut to the hem.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and v-cut at the front.
Bolero in fine-knit cotton with a glittery button at the front and long sleeves.
5-pocket, slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and narrow hems.
Hi-tops in imitation leather with elasticated lacing at the front, an adjustable hook and loop tab at the top and a loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Short-sleeved playsuit in soft, textured jersey with a wrapover front and detachable tie belt at the waist.
Cropped blouse in an airy linen and cotton weave with a deep V-neck and sewn-in tie detail at the front. Short, raglan puff sleeves with elastication and a small frill trim at the hems.
